title: Your Excellency President Mahinda Rajapaksa, Don’t let your Media Minister make a fool of your Excellency and Your Excellency’s Government!
content: Onlanka News – By N.Iresha Ratnayake REASONS STATED FOR IMPOSITION OF FEES FOR NEWS WEBSITES A FLAGRANT VIOLATION OF THE CONSTITUTION, UNDERMINING THE NORMS OF DEMOCRACY. Recent news of an imposition of a registration fee and an annual fee has baffled the local and international media. Perhaps the fall of the Media Minister in Australia…
